title: Past Continuous
content: At 8pm yesterday, he [was eating|ate].
explanationEnUs: Specific time in the past + continuous action.
explanationZhTw: 過去特定時間 + 進行動作。
explanationZhCn: 过去特定时间 + 进行动作。

title: Past Perfect
content: They said that they [had seen|saw] the movie.
explanationEnUs: Reported speech or earlier past action uses Past Perfect.
explanationZhTw: 間接引語或更早的過去動作使用過去完成式。
explanationZhCn: 间接引语或更早的过去动作使用过去完成时。

title: Past Perfect
content: Mary said that mary [had finished|finish] the movie.
explanationEnUs: Reported speech or earlier past action uses Past Perfect.
explanationZhTw: 間接引語或更早的過去動作使用過去完成式。
explanationZhCn: 间接引语或更早的过去动作使用过去完成时。
